A letter from Brue. It reads:
\fiWent out to escort Baroness home, will be back soon.
Left the instructions for the Stomach Elixir. Take this
as a final test of some sort. I know you can do it!
Hello, I am Lady Catherine, Baroness of this fief.
Pleased to make your acquaintance, Lady Catherine.
Catherine has a request for us.
Yes, I have a very important request!
One that cannot be delayed nor ignored for any longer!
Well, please let us know what your request entails,
so that we could help you to the best of our abilities!
I feel like I’m in such capable hands already!
What did I tell you, my dear Ca—lient, Lady Catherine!
I know I could trust you, Brue.
Yes! I am in need of a wonderfully potent potion.
An elixir like no other that can cure my\..\..\.. betrothed.
Oh no, is the Baron sick?
Unfortunately so. He has been in pain for days,
incapable of leaving the manor at all!
Trapped in the confines of our
bed chambers due to his ailing stomach.
I can’t imagine how hard it must be right now.
Well, lucky for you, Lady Catherine,
I have just the elixir in mind that can
It is a premium elixir, as you request,
but I will admit that it’s a process to mix.
The elixir is composed of a series of
smaller potions combined to create the
Lady Catherine, we can talk about payments in private.
Fer, you’ll be fulfilling this order with some
\fiWow, this is my biggest job yet!
And because of the mixture’s complexity,
I think that this might help you get your promotion!
Really!? It’s been so long since my last one,
and I’ve been really looking forward to it.
Especially because I read about this one ingredient
you keep that might be a great source of vitality
That’s a lot of talking and not working.
You’ll need to collect a series of ingredients to mix
the intermediary potions. Here are the first set of
Brue gives you an information sheet!
Perfect, then I will be on my way!
You can trust me, Lady Catherine.
I swear on my name as an alchemist!

from the dark forest or at the market place.
What did you want as payment?
\fiIt’s probably best not to disturb them.
